skill_description: Understanding written sentences and paragraphs in work-related documents.
Giving full attention to what other people are saying, taking time to understand the points being made.
Managing interactions to improve customer satisfaction and retention using CRM tools like Salesforce.
Collecting and analyzing data to identify trends and improve service processes.
Handling customer complaints effectively to reach satisfactory outcomes.
Leading and mentoring team members to achieve performance goals.
Managing and resolving conflicts in a professional manner.
Communicating effectively via phone, email, chat, and social media platforms.
